Identification.LongTitle: United Nations Organization Mission in Ethiopia and Eritrea (UNMEE) Medal Order

Provision.Text: Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby

Provision.Label: (a)
Provision.Text: authorizes Canadians to accept and wear the United Nations Mission in Ethiopia and Eritrea (UNMEE) Medal in recognition of honourable service with that mission; and

Provision.Label: (b)
Provision.Text: directs that the Medal follow the United Nations Organization Mission in the Democratic Republic of the Congo (MONUC) Medal in the order of precedence in the Canadian Honours System.
